item.description:
Kick off the month in style! The first Friday of each month, 5:30-9:30 pm

Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at mfafirstfridays. Join us in the Koch Gallery for fine art, live music, cash bars featuring signature cocktails, and a delicious tapas menu. Relax and unwind in the breathtaking ambience with friends both old and new.

Remaining Musical Lineup for Fall 2009:

November 6 - DJ Dave Pettengill

Upcoming:

December 4 - The Bob Christopherson Holiday Jazz Trio

Open to visitors twenty-one and older.

Members: entry is FREE
Nonmembers: entry is FREE with Museum admission

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: First Friday at the MFA: Come for the Art, Stay for a Drink
